name: School-wise Equipment List
query:
select
    sl.site as "TCIL Code",
    sl.udise_code as "UDISE Code",
    sl.school_name as "School Name",
    sl.district as "District",
    sl.block as "Block",
    sl.pin_code as "Pin Code",
    sr.item_code as "Item Code",
    sr.item_name as "Item Name",
    sr.vendor as "Manufacturer",
    sr.serial_number as "Serial number",
    sr.mac_id as "MAC ID",
    sr.installation_date as "Installation date"
from
    `tabSchool wise Equipment List`sl,
    `tabSchoolwise Equipment List childtable`sr
    
where
sr.parent = sl.name;
